content.en: Glucose control algorithms: Researchers are exploring the use of different algorithms to improve the control of glucose levels in artificial pancreas systems. These algorithms, such as zone model predictive control and extended model predictive control, aim to minimize the risk of both low and high glucose levels. Other approaches, like nonlinear model-based robust control and learning-based model predictive control, are being investigated to enhance the safety, stability, and individualization of glucose control in these systems.
content.da: Glukosekontrolalgoritmer: Forskere undersøger brugen af forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre kontrollen af glukoseniveauer i kunstige bugspytkirtelsystemer. Disse algoritmer, såsom zone-modelforudsigende kontrol og udvidet modelforudsigende kontrol, sigter mod at minimere risikoen for både lave og høje glukoseniveauer. Andre tilgange, som ikke-lineær modelbaseret robust kontrol og læringsbaseret modelforudsigende kontrol, bliver undersøgt for at forbedre sikkerheden, stabiliteten og individualiseringen af glukosekontrol i disse systemer.
